item.title: Flying Spaghetti Monster in Spore Creature Creator
item.description: Various people have expressed wonder, delight, or dismay at the amount of time they have spent tonight playing with the Spore Creature Creator. To save you those emotions, I give you rapture - the verified appearance of the Flying Spaghetti Monster, as envisioned by a devout Pastafarian.
